name: StickCity 5 Rematered {BETA}
description:
SC5R Stickcity® 5 Remastered

GuestBloxo Corporation/The Stickman Co., LTD ©2023

Realease Date: 27/03/2023 27th March 2023

Nothing but Stickmans in StickCity™

StickCity 5 Remastered is the ultimate edition of the classic action-adventure game. Explore a vast open world full of Stickmans , missions and  Customize your character with hundreds of outfits and weapons. Experience the improved graphics, physics and gameplay of the remastered version. Whether you want to cause Trouble  fight crime or just have fun, StickCity® 5 Remastered lets you play your way.
